renegades.name: Renegades™
renegades.productInfoText: A cutting-edge design that delivers maximum performance. Featuring market-leading 8KO® lenses and ultra-durable frames for the active everyday.

attributes.name: description
attributes.content: Shop Renegades™ sunglasses - cutting-edge design for maximum performance. Market-leading 8KO® lenses & ultra-durable frames. Lifetime Guarantee.
Shop Renegades™ sunglasses - cutting-edge design for maximum performance. Market-leading 8KO® lenses & ultra-durable frames. Lifetime Guarantee.

attributes.name: twitter:description
attributes.content: Shop Renegades™ sunglasses - cutting-edge design for maximum performance. Market-leading 8KO® lenses & ultra-durable frames. Lifetime Guarantee.

inTheBoxItems.title: 100% Microfibre Pouch
inTheBoxItems.description: For storage and cleaning, made from recycled plastic bottles.

inTheBoxItems.title: SunGod Sticker Pack
inTheBoxItems.description: Vinyl cut stickers, packaged in recyclable paper.

quotes.quote: It’s the vivid reflective lenses which really steal the show... And the matte frames have a long-standing, potentially scratch-proof durability to them.
Classic in shape, lightweight and secure fitting, they are just as good for sports as for everyday use.
They seem almost indestructible, consisting of bendable plastic frames and ultra-clear, ultra-tough lenses.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: McLaren F1 Team Collection
baseProduct.productInfoText: Meet the McLaren F1 Team Renegades™, featuring SunGod’s industry-leading 8KO® Fire lenses, coupled with Frosted Black frames and a McLaren lens engraving. Finished with a Papaya logo plate and iconic McLaren logo.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: McLaren F1 Team Collection
baseProduct.productInfoText: Meet the Limited Edition McLaren F1 Team Renegades™ Plus, featuring SunGod’s industry-leading 8KO® Polarised Smoke lenses, coupled with Frosted Black frames and a McLaren lens engraving. Finished with a Black logo plate and the iconic Papaya McLaren speedmark.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: Oscar Piastri Collection
baseProduct.productInfoText: Introducing Limited Edition McLaren F1 Team OP81 SunGod Renegades™, designed in collaboration with McLaren F1 Team Driver Oscar Piastri. Featuring SunGod’s industry-leading 8KO® Smoke lenses, coupled with 100% recycled Black frames and a McLaren lens engraving. Finished with an Oscar Yellow 81 logo plate.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: Triple Black Renegades™
baseProduct.productInfoText: Our bestseller goes dark. The Renegades™ Triple Black Edition couples your favourite shape with the clarity of 8KO® lenses and a stealth look for eyewear that doesn't shout, but still stands out.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: New York Yankees
baseProduct.productInfoText:
Introducing the all-new Limited Edition New York Yankees Renegades™. Featuring industry-leading Smoke lenses, with Matte Black frames and a unique NY Yankees lens engraving, we’ve given our bestselling sunglasses a New York twist. Let’s Go Yankees!
</br>
</br>
SunGod is the Official Licensee of MLB.

material.title: Material
material.tooltip: SunGod standard lenses are precisely engineered from 2mm polycarbonate. This is our original lens technology, and features a triple-layer scratch-resistant coating and certified impact protection.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: LA Dodgers
baseProduct.productInfoText:
Introducing the all-new Limited Edition LA Dodgers Renegades™. Featuring industry-leading Blue lenses, with Frosted Clear frames and a unique LA Dodgers engraving, we’ve given our bestselling sunglasses an LA twist. Let’s Go Dodgers!
</br>
</br>
SunGod is the Official Licensee of MLB.

material.title: Material
material.tooltip: SunGod standard lenses are precisely engineered from 2mm polycarbonate. This is our original lens technology, and features a triple-layer scratch-resistant coating and certified impact protection.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: San Diego Padres
baseProduct.productInfoText: Back the Padres in style with the San Diego Padres Renegades™. Featuring SunGod’s industry-leading Gold lenses, coupled with Matte Brown frames and an SD lens engraving. Finished with a Gold logo plate and the iconic SD logo.

material.title: Material
material.tooltip: SunGod standard lenses are precisely engineered from 2mm polycarbonate. This is our original lens technology, and features a triple-layer scratch-resistant coating and certified impact protection.

responsiveImage.alt: Female model wearing San Diego Padres Renegades Sunglasses
Male model wearing San Diego Padres Renegades Sunglasses

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: England Cricket
baseProduct.productInfoText: Introducing the all-new England Cricket Renegades™. These limited edition Renegades™ feature industry-leading Gold lenses, Matte Black frames and a Lions lens engraving, to help cricketers and fans catch every moment. Finished with the iconic England Lion logo plate.

material.title: Material
material.tooltip: SunGod standard lenses are precisely engineered from 2mm polycarbonate. This is our original lens technology, and features a triple-layer scratch-resistant coating and certified impact protection.

children.value: Sunglasses without prescription, featuring triple-layer scratch resistance and 100% UV-A and UV-B protection.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: Surfers Against Sewage
baseProduct.productInfoText: Limited Edition Renegades™ designed in collaboration with Surfers Against Sewage. Featuring Infinite™ 100% Recycled Frames and - for the first time ever - 8KO® Infinite™ 50% Recycled Lenses, the latest sustainable step in our mission to See Better. For every pair bought, we'll donate 50% to Surfers Against Sewage.

staticLensTech.displaySubtitle: Infinite™ lenses with enhanced clarity and 50% recycled material.

material.title: Material
material.tooltip: SunGod 8KO® lenses are precisely engineered from 2mm nylon. This material has all the benefits of our original lens technology, plus it's lighter, clearer and stronger.

children.value: Sunglasses without prescription, featuring triple-layer scratch resistance and 100% UV-A and UV-B protection.
Sunglasses with single-vision corrective lenses, for long or short-sighted prescription wearers.
We’ll ask for your prescription after checkout.
